attributes.action: build a new capital city for the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon the Prime Minister to initiate a project to build a new capital city for the United Kingdom in the geographical centre of the country in order to decrease the over-concentration of political and economic power in London. Such a city should be built as a showcase of 21st Century sustainable, environmentally-friendly technology and aesthetic architecture. It would also alleviate over-crowding and congestion in London and the south east.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
